title: Tahm Kench is annoying as ****
body: I'll start off by saying he's kind of a neat champion idea.  I do not however think anyone else on my team should make me lose control of my champion.  I didn't like Kalista's ult for that reason and I think Tahm Kench is even worse.  Losing control of my own champion is just annoying.  I'm sure the pros will find all kinds of interesting ways to use these abilities to their advantage, but meanwhile 99% of the players will get aggravated.  It brings on a whole other level of trolling when I'm sitting there trying to recall to get back to base quickly to buy so I can return to lane just to have Tahm Kench walk up and eat me.  Stop taking away my ability to control my own character.  It's not fun.
